price: Na wamekanusha na wamefuata matamanio yao. Na kila jambo ni lenye kuthibiti.
arabic: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ
footnotes: Na wamewakanusha Mitume na wakafuata yaliyo zainishwa na matamanio yao. Na kila jambo huishia mwisho wake linapo tulia na kuthibiti.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wakadhabū wa-ittabaʿū ahwāahum wakullu amrin mus'taqirrun
